sqlMap.select: select am.DES_DENOM_NORMA as desDenomNorma, am.DES_NORMA as desNorma, am.FEC_PUBLICA_NORMA as fecPublicaNorma, am.FEC_INICIO_VIGENCIA as fecInicioVigencia, am.DES_ACC_REALIZADA as desAccRealizada, am.DES_ENLACE_NORMA as desEnlaceNorma from VMCDBA.INF1ALERTA_MODIFICACION am where am.ID_OCEX = #idOcex# and am.NUM_PERIODO_TRIM = #numPeriodoTrim#
